rooms.description: A spacious entry with a north-facing entrance that adheres to Vastu principles. This area sets the tone for the minimalist design and provides a welcoming feel.
A large open space with floor-to-ceiling windows to ensure ample natural light. The minimalist aesthetic is maintained through clean lines and functional furniture placement.
Integrated within the living space or adjacent, featuring a modern dining table that complements the overall design. It is located to maintain a balance with the courtyard views.
Modern and functional kitchen with streamlined cabinetry and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light. Considered placement near dining area for convenience.
Spacious bedroom featuring a balcony. The north-facing aspect of the room is enhanced by floor-to-ceiling windows that also contribute to Vastu compliance.
Second bedroom with a spacious balcony. The layout maintains minimalism while ensuring privacy and ample light.
Third bedroom designed to serve joint family needs, complete with its own balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows for a bright environment.

A central open courtyard that serves as the heart of the house. It allows natural ventilation and sunlight into the interior spaces while adhering to Vastu principles by providing a balanced energy flow.
Conveniently located near the living area with accessible design and privacy for guests.
A compact space for storage of cleaning supplies and small appliances. Designed to maintain the minimalist aesthetic while being functional.

openings.description: A main entrance door positioned on the north to enhance positive energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Floor-to-ceiling windows installed in living room and all bedrooms for maximum natural light.
Spacious balconies attached to each bedroom for a seamless indoor-outdoor connection.
Openable openings that connect the central courtyard with adjoining rooms, enhancing natural ventilation and light flow.
